title: Client lag, but none in-game?
body: My buddy misses ready checks and bans occasionally because his league client lags, but he has no issues in-game. Anyone know what that might be and how to fix it?

replies.body:
Think the best suggestion for a quick solution would indeed be to enable low specs mode; doing that will turn off most of the animations in client and reduce the amount of stuff that needs to be processed.

For a long term solution, it may be worth checking that his graphics card drivers are updated. Perhaps they're having trouble. Have him [**run through these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1) here and let me know if, while Low Specs Mode is off, the client is still laggy by testing the pick phase in a custom or training match.

He might want to [Enable Low Spec Mode](https://imgur.com/7lNgDzh) to improve client performance if he did not already do that, and he could run through the guide to check for [Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
